arts.ttl: Lille 1-0 Real Madrid: Player ratings as underwhelming Champions League holders beaten
arts.sum: Madrid’s pressing earned their first chance of the night, a sighter from Vinicius Junior after the ball was won high up pitch, but a relatively simple save for Lille’s Lucas Chevalier. Madrid looked like they’d got off the hook on a couple of occasions late on, first as substitute Arda Guler’s far post caused mayhem and Antonio Rudiger saw his attempt scrambled off the line, before Chevalier did enough to deny Jude Bellingham.

arts.ttl: Ancelotti reveals why he’s WORRIED about Real Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti admitted that he is ‘worried’ about his team after they were defeated 1-0 by Lille in the Champions League on Wednesday. We played several times on Sunday and Wednesday, today was not a good evening, we have to improve and that's it,” he admitted.

arts.ttl: Lille sink Madrid to end 14-game UCL unbeaten run
arts.sum: A first-half penalty earned Lille a shock 1-0 home victory over holders Real Madrid in the Champions League group phase on Wednesday, ending the 15-times European Cup winners' 14-game unbeaten run in the competition.

arts.ttl: ‘Bad’ – Carlo Ancelotti slams Real Madrid stars for display vs Lille
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has on Wednesday night taken firm aim at his players. As much comes owing to their performance in the club’s latest outing. Real of…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid suffer Champions League defeat as Jude Bellingham frustrated in new role
arts.sum: UCL ROUND-UP: Jude Bellingham and co lost for the first time this season as they faced Lille on a dramatic night in the Champions League, while 10-man Juventus pulled off a gutsy comeback

arts.ttl: Arda Güler sends message to Carlo Ancelotti in Real Madrid’s defeat to Lille
arts.sum: Real Madrid youngster Arda Güler tonight sent a message the way of head coach Carlo Ancelotti. As much came by way of his late cameo in Real’s meeting with LOSC…

arts.ttl: Lille 1-0 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as David hits winner
arts.sum: Jonathan David scores the winner as Lille record a shock 1-0 victory over Champions League holders Real Madrid in France.

arts.ttl: Champions League live blog: Real Madrid-Lille, Liverpool-Bologna
arts.sum: The latest updates and analysis from matchday two of the 2024-25 Champions League season, with Real Madrid visiting Lille and Liverpool hosting Bologna.

arts.ttl: Endrick breaks Real Madrid legend Raúl’s near-30-year record vs Lille
arts.sum: Real Madrid starlet Endrick has on Wednesday night etched his name into the history books of the Spanish giants. As much comes by way of his starting berth in Real’s…
